page.title: 11RECREATION RIVER NAIRN
page.content: The{River Nairn}flows through the western section of our D block. Over many years the river and surrounding area has become a centre for many leisure activities. There is{fishing} on the river itself,{footpaths}and three{footbridges}allow people to walk on the banks and also{picnic}tables,{ {play parks}and two{football}pitches provide further recreation.More recently a{Go-kart track,}an{athletics {club}area a{B.M.X.}track for bicycles have been added. {ANGLING ASSOCIATION}has{240}members.To fish on the river you need a{permit costing{Â£23}for Adults,{Â£4}for Juniors and{Â£5}for old age pensioners.The permit allows{fishing}from the{habour up river for ten miles.The{fishing} season is from{11th Feb}until {30th {Sept}and{salmon,trout}and{finnock}can be caught.{
